    • from

      public SimulateCall.Builder from(Address from)
      Sets the sender address for this call (optional override).

    • to

      Sets the target address for this call (required).

      Sets the calldata for this call.

    • gas

      public SimulateCall.Builder gas(BigInteger gas)
      Sets the gas limit for this call.

    • gasPrice

      public SimulateCall.Builder gasPrice(BigInteger gasPrice)
      Sets the legacy gas price (pre-EIP-1559). Cannot be used with maxFeePerGas or maxPriorityFeePerGas.

    • maxFeePerGas

      public SimulateCall.Builder maxFeePerGas(BigInteger maxFeePerGas)
      Sets the maximum fee per gas (EIP-1559). Cannot be used with gasPrice.

    • maxPriorityFeePerGas

      public SimulateCall.Builder maxPriorityFeePerGas(BigInteger maxPriorityFeePerGas)
      Sets the maximum priority fee per gas (EIP-1559). Cannot be used with gasPrice.

    • build

      public SimulateCall build()
      Builds the SimulateCall instance.
      Returns:
      a new SimulateCall
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if to is not set
      IllegalArgumentException - if both legacy and EIP-1559 gas fields are set
